entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023
